thread.section_title: The Soho Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Perfect !!!!
thread.title_full: Perfect !!!! - Review of The Soho Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: beantay
title: Perfect !!!!
text: Just stayed 2 nights at this amazing hotel !!! It was fabulous from it's appearance to the beautiful, clean cotton sheets on the really comfy beds !!! This hotel has class !!! The food was delicious and the in house toiletries were beautiful !!! But the shining star at this hotel is the staff- friendly, attentive, welcoming,smart, polite and helpful !!! They made our stay such a memorable experience !!! Thank you !!! Hope to stay with you again soon !!!
